Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. The Rockets cut the deficit to 101-97, but Allen Iverson drained a three-pointer with 3:48 remaining and Houston got no closer than seven the rest of the way. We executed at the end, whereas previous games we didn't do that, said Allen Iverson , who committed no turnovers. ''This is a confidence boost for us. We played with control when we got the lead in the fourth quarter and we played solid defense all game long.''

for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role-- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said Peter Schiff Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. ''It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page.
